title: CRM Specialist (HCM - Onboard ASAP)
company_name: AHAMOVE - Người vận chuyển của bạn
job_description:
CRM Performance Monitoring & Automation Optimization (60%)
Work closely with CRM specialists to monitor the performance of automation flows within the CRM system.
Collaborate with the CRM team to optimize implemented automation processes to enhance efficiency and user experience.
Conduct A/B testing and analyze results to evaluate improvements in automation workflows.
Provide insights and recommendations to improve the performance and effectiveness of CRM processes.
Research & Analysis (40%)
Conduct in-depth research on competitors to understand their CRM strategies, products, and services.
Analyze customer behavior and market trends to uncover insights that can improve the CRM strategy.
Benchmark competitors’ products in terms of features, pricing, and service quality to identify improvement areas or differentiators.
Prepare detailed reports and presentations summarizing key findings and recommended actions.
requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, BA, Computer Science, Data Science, or related fields.
1–2 years of experience in CRM, market research, or data analysis.
Practical experience with CDP tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, or similar platforms) is a plus.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks.
Understanding of automation processes and optimization techniques within CRM systems.
Data-driven mindset with a focus on problem-solving and performance optimization.
Proactive, meticulous, and eager to learn new technologies.
High sense of responsibility, capable of working independently.
Collaborative and adaptive to a fast-paced working environment.
